description.raw: Previously, joint clamping was not implemented on the client side (GUI Plugin) for direct motor control (wrist ZXC or fingers after pressing ~). This means that after holding a button to increment a joint far past its joint limit, you would have to hold the button for a while to decrement it before making a change. This pull request should fix this behavior.
description.html: Previously, joint clamping was not implemented on the client side (GUI Plugin) for direct motor control (wrist ZXC or fingers after pressing ~). This means that after holding a button to increment a joint far past its joint limit, you would have to hold the button for a while to decrement it before making a change. This pull request should fix this behavior.

title.raw: Implemented joint limit clamping on client side
